text: Hello, Everyone, This video about How to draw a Manga Girl by PaintTool, Sai
Hello, Everyone, This video about How to draw a Manga Girl, using PaintTool, SAI
How to draw a Manga Girl? First, you can   draw a draft of a body structure.
and you can draw the hair outline
also, draw the manga eye based on the face   size. Tips: One eye space between two eyes =D
Then, draw the outline after drawing the sketch.
Drawing manga hair may need practice. Girl hair should draw softly.
Then, draw the manga eyes, typically,draw a curve and   a bigger circle for the eyes. O_O
